article_title: Sheriff Frank McKeithen Addresses Spring Break
article_text:
Bay County Sheriff Frank McKeithen talks about spring break violence in a Saturday afternoon press conference.

McKeithen talks about the shooting that injured seven people early Saturday morning as well as addressing spring break statistic so far.

McKeithen also brings up his proposals from last year, saying he still stands by them. A link to those proposals can be found to the right.

To hear the full conference, click on the video above.
